name: Fruit Hero Legend
description:
Fruit Hero Legend is a juicy and funny match-3 game which is completely free.
Fruit Hero Legend is a new play game with impressive game screen and effects.
Welcome to the juicy fruit world! Start your journey with other players!
By the way, Fruit Hero Legend is very popular with beautiful ladies!

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Pop more than 2 of the same fruits to crush!
- Pop more than 5 of the same fruits to generate a new special candy - rocket candy!
- Pop more than 7 of the same fruits to generate a new special candy - bomb candy!
- Pop more than 10 of the same fruits to generate an amazing super fruit candy!

[WHAT YOU CAN DO]
- Rescue the cute animals.
- Achieve different goals with different ways.
- Get free boosters and use them at critical moment.
- Crush different special candies which are designed very interesting.

[GAME FEATURES]
- Perfect gaming experience.
- Easy and completely free game.
- Very friendly to ladies.
- Play game anytime anywhere even there is no internet.
- 1630+ levels.
- Juicy and colorful game world.
